---
title: "VideoSegment"
---
<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

A segment of video made up of one or more samples, always starts with a key frame.

## Fields

* timestamp: [`UInt64`](../datatypes/uint64.md)
* samples: list of [`VideoSample`](../datatypes/video_sample.md)
